abstract.para: Code examples that show how to use &ATP; with an &AWS; SDK.

chapter.para: The following code examples show how to use &ATP; with an &AWS; software development kit (SDK).

variablelist.para: The examples are divided into the following categories:

listitem.para: Code examples that show you how to accomplish a specific task by calling multiple functions within the same service.

chapter.para: For a complete list of &AWS; SDK developer guides and code examples, see . This topic also includes information about getting started and details about previous SDK versions.

abstract.para: The following code examples show how to use &ATP; with &AWS; SDKs.

section.para: The following code examples show you how to implement common scenarios in &ATP; with &AWS; SDKs. These scenarios show you how to accomplish specific tasks by calling multiple functions within &ATP;. Each scenario includes a link to GitHub, where you can find instructions on how to set up and run the code.

info.title: Run browser tests with &ATP; and take screenshots using an &AWS; SDK
info.titleabbrev: Run browser tests and take screenshots

abstract.para: Run browser tests with &ATP; and take screenshots using an &AWS; SDK

note.para: The source code for these examples is in the &AWS; Code Examples GitHub repository. Have feedback on a code example? Create an Issue in the code examples repo.

section.para: For a complete list of &AWS; SDK developer guides and code examples, see . This topic also includes information about getting started and details about previous SDK versions.
